about_the_game:
Take control of Berith, a demon priestess ready to shoot her way through an angel infested Hell, in her crusade to hunt three powerful demons that have been corrupted by the angelic forces. Unleash your arsenal of four powerful guns and weave between them in order to string together stylish combos. And remember:

"It's not about size or speed, it's about technique."

Use all the weapons given to you

Earn COMBO RANKS by shooting with different weapons. Switching weapons allows you to shoot faster. Heal yourself by damaging enemies at a high COMBO RANK.

Augment your mobility with three different dashes

By DASHING at the maximum COMBO RANK you can slow down time, become invisible or create a powerful explosion.

Never stop shooting

Instantly reload all weapons by shooting with all guns at least once.

Every gun comes equipped with a main fire mode and an unlockable alternate fire mode. The Belial and the Purson are a pair of shotguns that compliment each other's damage, both with alternate shots that augment your mobility. The Ballista fires an explosive flaming bolt, setting enemies on fire and increasing the damage they take, and finally, the Asmodeus Opus is a revolver that deals high damage against dying enemies, redirecting your bullet and reloading all weapons on a kill.

  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher

short_description: Heavenstrafer is a fast paced movement shooter with a gun combo system that rewards aggressiveness and experimentation. Explore the ruins of hell and destroy angels (and demons) across three chapters filled with compact but challenging arenas.
